com.rigado.rigablue

Class RigService

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.rigado.rigablue.RigService

  • public class RigService
extends java.lang.Object
    Service class for managing connection and data communication with a GATT server hosted on a given Bluetooth LE device.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      RigService(android.content.Context context, IRigCoreListener iRigCoreListener)
      Constructs a RigService object.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods Deprecated Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void close()
      After using a given BLE device, the app must call this method to ensure resources are released properly.
      boolean connect(java.lang.String address)
      Connects to the GATT server hosted on the Bluetooth LE device.
      void disconnect(java.lang.String address)
      Disconnects an existing connection or cancel a pending connection.
      int getConnectionStateForDevice(android.bluetooth.BluetoothDevice device)
      Deprecated. 
      Use RigCoreBluetooth.getDeviceConnectionState(BluetoothDevice) instead.
      java.util.List<android.bluetooth.BluetoothGattService> getSupportedGattServices(java.lang.String address)
      Retrieves a list of supported GATT services on the connected device.
      boolean initialize()
      Initializes a reference to the local Bluetooth adapter.
      void readCharacteristic(java.lang.String address, android.bluetooth.BluetoothGattCharacteristic characteristic)
      Request a read on a given BluetoothGattCharacteristic.

      Request a read on a given BluetoothGattDescriptor.

      Enables or disables notification on a the characteristic.
      void writeCharacteristic(java.lang.String address, android.bluetooth.BluetoothGattCharacteristic characteristic)
      Request a write on a the BluetoothGattCharacteristic.

        public RigService(android.content.Context context,
                  IRigCoreListener iRigCoreListener)
        Constructs a RigService object.
        Parameters:

        iRigCoreListener - The observer of this object

    • Method Detail

      • initialize

        public boolean initialize()
        Initializes a reference to the local Bluetooth adapter.
        Returns:
        Return true if the initialization is successful.

      • getConnectionStateForDevice

        @Deprecated
public int getConnectionStateForDevice(android.bluetooth.BluetoothDevice device)
        Deprecated. Use RigCoreBluetooth.getDeviceConnectionState(BluetoothDevice) instead.
        Returns the current connection state for the device
        Parameters:
        device - The device for which to retrieve the connection state
        Returns:
        The connection state

      • connect

        public boolean connect(java.lang.String address)
        Connects to the GATT server hosted on the Bluetooth LE device.
        Parameters:
        address - The device address of the destination device.
        Returns:
        Return true if the connection is initiated successfully. The connection result is reported asynchronously through the BluetoothGattCallback#onConnectionStateChange(android.bluetooth.BluetoothGatt, int, int) callback.

      • disconnect

        public void disconnect(java.lang.String address)
        Disconnects an existing connection or cancel a pending connection. The disconnection result is reported asynchronously through the BluetoothGattCallback#onConnectionStateChange(android.bluetooth.BluetoothGatt, int, int) callback.
        Parameters:
        address - The address of the destination device.

      • close

        public void close()
        After using a given BLE device, the app must call this method to ensure resources are released properly.

      • readCharacteristic

        public void readCharacteristic(java.lang.String address,
                               android.bluetooth.BluetoothGattCharacteristic characteristic)
        Request a read on a given BluetoothGattCharacteristic. The read result is reported asynchronously through the BluetoothGattCallback#onCharacteristicRead(android.bluetooth.BluetoothGatt, android.bluetooth.BluetoothGattCharacteristic, int) callback.
        Parameters:
        address - The address of the destination device.
        characteristic - The characteristic to read

      • writeCharacteristic

        public void writeCharacteristic(java.lang.String address,
                                android.bluetooth.BluetoothGattCharacteristic characteristic)
        Request a write on a the BluetoothGattCharacteristic. The write result is reported asynchronously through the BluetoothGattCallback#onCharacteristicWrite(android.bluetooth.BluetoothGatt, android.bluetooth.BluetoothGattCharacteristic, int) callback.
        Parameters:
        address - The address of the destination device.
        characteristic - The characteristic to write

      • readDescriptor

        public void readDescriptor(java.lang.String address,
                           android.bluetooth.BluetoothGattDescriptor descriptor)
        Request a read on a given BluetoothGattDescriptor. The read result is reported asynchronously through the BluetoothGattCallback#onDescriptorRead(android.bluetooth.BluetoothGatt, android.bluetooth.BluetoothGattDescriptor, int) callback.
        Parameters:
        address - The address of the destination device.
        descriptor - The descriptor to read

      • setCharacteristicNotification

        public void setCharacteristicNotification(java.lang.String address,
                                          android.bluetooth.BluetoothGattCharacteristic characteristic,
                                          boolean enabled)
        Enables or disables notification on a the characteristic.
        Parameters:
        address - The address of the destination device.
        characteristic - Characteristic to act on
        enabled - If true, enable notification; false otherwise

      • getSupportedGattServices

        public java.util.List<android.bluetooth.BluetoothGattService> getSupportedGattServices(java.lang.String address)
        Retrieves a list of supported GATT services on the connected device. This should be invoked only after BluetoothGatt#discoverServices() completes successfully.
        Parameters:
        address - The address of the destination device.
        Returns:
        A List of supported services.
